**图片来源：**
* 1) [http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/the-great-hippo/scp_trans.png SCP_Trans.png by The Great Hippo, CC-BY-SA 3.0]
* 2) [https://www.geograph.org.uk/photo/1733287 Cantley Sugarbeet factory at Night by Ashley Dace, CC-BY-SA 2.0]
* 3) [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Polmone_d%27acciaio_(Alvis_Motor_Company)_.jpg Polmone d'acciaio (Alvis Motor Company) by Luca Borghi, CC-BY-SA 3.0]
